--- Simon Chappell <simonpeterchappell@g...> wrote:
> And don't forget the folks in corporate employment with
> STANDARDS that say they must use exactly 1.4.2 and who
> won't see JDK 1.5 for not less than a year. And us Mac
> using folks won't see it until Steve Jobs deems it fit for us.
> 
> I guess I won't be using JUnit 4 for quite a while yet. :-(

I know of one large and active development shop that is still stuck on 
Java 1.3  ...on their SERVERS!!!  They hope to upgrade to Java 1.4 
some time in the future.  They're not sure when.  (Probably not this 
year.  )-:
